mapper.select: select comment.*,course.*,course.Id "course_id",comment.Id "comment_Id",comment.content "comment_content",comment.critic "comment_critic",comment.date "comment_date",comment.type "comment_type",comment.belong "comment_belong" from t_course course left join t_comment comment on comment.type='‘course’' and course.Id=comment.belong where course.Id=#{Id};
select * from t_course where name like '%${name}%' or intro like '%${name}%'

select course.Id,course.name,count(*) as heat from t_course as course, t_comment as comment where date between #{begin} and #{end} and belong = course.Id and type='‘course’' order by heat DESC limit 1;
select Id,name from t_course order by Id DESC limit 1

select course.Id,course.name,count(*) as heat from t_course as course, t_comment as comment where date between #{begin} and #{end} and belong = course.Id and type='‘course’' order by heat DESC limit 20;
